message: GC, I believe this product is of exceptional value, and I'm confident it will greatly benefit your business. I'm offering it to you for $1150000. This price reflects the significant value I see in this product, while also leaving room for a mutually beneficial agreement.
I have an offer this amount is acceptable.

GC, while I appreciate your offer, I believe a slightly higher price would be more reflective of the product's true value. I'm willing to negotiate further and offer the product for $1050000. This compromise demonstrates my willingness to find a solution that works for both of us.
